Summary: Craft flew at us, then almost landed, no noise, no wings, at dusk.
divs: Sighting DetailsLong story, we have been seeing them a lot. To long of a story to tell here... but craft communicated to us. We see mostly triangles, and this one (not a triangle) that communicated to us in the field. I have video of first contact (summer of 2011), but just lights show up on actual footage. I have seen them as close as under 30 feet... seen the pilot (humaniod) sitting in the front of the triangles. Much activity.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
